article.headline: Biogen names Michael McDonnell as new CFO
article.body: Biogen Inc. BIIB, -0.13% said late Tuesday that Michael McDonnell will become chief financial officer on Aug. 15. Currently, McDonnell serves as CFO at life-sciences company Iqvia Holdings Inc. IQV, +1.38%. Biogen's current CFO, Jeffrey Capello, will step down in mid-August and remain with the company until Sept. 15 to assist in the transition.
